metadata.title: CVE-2018-20182 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain a Buffer Overflow over the global variables in the function seamless_process_line() that results in memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.4-1').
